derrell.lipman@unwireduniverse.com wrote:

> I understand.  It's a royal PITA, but I understand.  And 

I empathize.  But we all have to deal with it.  Alternatively,
maybe we'll move to bzr at some point and that would lay the
responsibility on a branch maintainer to pull the changes
(either manually or automatically).

> I do not believe there are any current discrepancies in 
> code that I've worked on between the three branches.
> Everything should, I think, be in sync.

Thanks.





cheers, jerry
